chapter_so_far_add: Artie has successfully navigated the first major environmental threat and reached the safety of Oakhaven, though his glitchy nature is now public knowledge.
key_events: Artie reached the Oakhaven gates with critical stamina depletion while pursued by a monster horde.
Guards Ted and Bill delayed entry to gamble on Artie's survival odds against the approaching monsters.
The Oakhaven Automated Defense scanner verified Artie's 1 HP and 100% Crit Rate, flagging him as a Paradoxical Anomaly.
Artie completed the 'Run for Your Life!' quest upon entering the city seconds before the gate dropped.
The city gate dropped like a guillotine, killing the lead wolf of the pursuing horde.
Artie received 50 XP, 10 Silver, and the 'Gate-Crasher' title (Inactive) as quest rewards.
last_scene: Artie reached the gates of Oakhaven while pursued by a monster horde, only to be delayed by guards betting on his survival.
After being scanned and flagged as a Paradoxical Anomaly, Artie was admitted into the city seconds before the horde reached him, completing his first major quest.
